#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define fo(i,n) for(i=0;i<n;i++)
#define Fo(i,k,n) for(i=k;i<n;i++)
using namespace std;
void sd(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

int main()
{
	int t,i;
	sd(t);
	
	int arr[t];
	fo(i,t)
		sd(arr[i]);
	sort(arr,arr+t);
	printf("%d\n",arr[(t-1)/2]);
	
	return 0;
}
